category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 20 (Training Records/Preservation)
contents: Article 20 (Training Records and Preservation) The supervisor must prepare and store the results of safety and health education, recording the following matters, according to the safety and health education log in Annex Form No. 1. In this case, when entrusted education is provided, a certificate of education, etc. must be obtained from the relevant educational institution and preserved. Revised December 22, 2021, 1. Training date and location, 2. Training person, 3. Curriculum and content, 4. Training target and number of participants, 5. Other information necessary to prove training results
